This project was the first time I got into stencil and web components overall andwhy this very website uses web components. I was apart of the team that built this project at TalkTalk,a StencilJS based component library designed to allow quick and easy reuse ofUI components across multiple stacks. It allows us to quickly build pages that conformed to our UI/UX standards.


Summary of the project is as followed:

  • This library was written in StencilJS and Typescript and tested with Jest.
  • The biggest challenge, modernising the old bower based baseline styling and migrating it in this library for use. Styling does use Bootstrap(v3).
  • This library is actively being used within Talktalk site, mainly within Myaccount and Micro Frontend Architecture.
  • Library contains a range of components from header, footer, simple copy, icon cards and much more.
  • Library is presented on a tool called Storybook, which allows us to actively test and document each component functionality.
  • Created the project in github following gitflow principles.
  • Release pipeline is setup on azure and linked to its home of github.
  • The library is currently being served as a blob and added via URL on the head of project HTML pages.
